title: Polar Visible Imaging System (VIS) Low Res. Camera - Louis A. Frank (The University of Iowa)

info.x_cadence_note: Cadence based on variable 'Epoch' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/polar/vis/vis_visible-imager-calibrated/1996/po_vis_visible-imager-calibrated_1996111222_v01.cdf. This most common cadence occurred for 20.0000% of the 1 timesteps. Cadence = 24250 [ms] = PT24.25S.
info.contact: Louis A. Frank @ The University of Iowa

parameters.name: Image_Counts_Raw
parameters.description: 256 x 256 Visible Image (quasi-logarithmically compressed counts)

parameters.name: Image_Counts_Clean
parameters.description: 256 x 256 Cleaned and Filtered Visible Image (quasi-logarithmically compressed counts)

parameters.name: Mapped_ImageO
parameters.description: --> (USE SHORT TIME SPANS) With geographic map overlay. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function alternate_view (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['Image_Counts_Clean', 'Geo_Lat', 'Geo_Lon']. Note that not all COMPONENTS are time series and so their values are not available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: Mapped_ImageP
parameters.description: --> (USE SHORT TIME SPANS) Azimuthal projection to geographic (fixed sun orientation). This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function alternate_view (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['Image_Counts_Clean', 'Geo_Lat', 'Geo_Lon', 'Intens_Tables']. Note that not all COMPONENTS are time series and so their values are not available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: Mapped_ImageM
parameters.description: --> (USE SHORT TIME SPANS) Azimuthal projection to magnetic LT and invariant lat. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function alternate_view (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['Image_Counts_Clean', 'Geo_Lat', 'Geo_Lon']. Note that not all COMPONENTS are time series and so their values are not available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: Movie_Image
parameters.description: Movie display of cleaned UV images in QLC counts. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function alternate_view (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['Image_Counts_Clean']. Note that not all COMPONENTS are time series and so their values are not available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.
parameters.units: Cleaned UV Intensity in QLC Counts

parameters.name: Mapped_MovieO

parameters.description: UV Images in kRay

parameters.name: Filter
parameters.description: ---> Filter number and peak wavelength in Angstroms)

parameters.name: AltF
parameters.description: ---> Presumed altitude of emissions, km.

parameters.name: Field_Stop
parameters.description: ---> Field-stop wheel position (1 step = 1.5 degrees)

parameters.name: PPitch
parameters.description: ---> Platform pointing angle from nadir

parameters.name: Mirr_Elv
parameters.description: ---> Mirror pointing angle, elevation

parameters.name: Mirr_Azm
parameters.description: ---> Mirror pointing angle, azimuth

parameters.name: Geo_Lat
parameters.description: Geographic latitude grid

parameters.name: Geo_Lon
parameters.description: Geographic longitude grid

parameters.name: SC_Pos_GCI
parameters.description: GCI position vector of Polar spacecraft in kilometers.

parameters.name: SC_Vel_GCI
parameters.description: ---> GCI velocity vector of Polar spacecraft in km/sec.

parameters.name: SC_SpinV_GCI
parameters.description: ---> GCI spin axis unit vector of Polar spacecraft.

parameters.name: D_Qual
parameters.description: Data quality flags
